name: Toby Sharp
cooked: I think it would be helpful and meaningful if you showed like-for-like comparative performance between your optimized library and the baseline libsecp256k1 implementation used by Bitcoin Core for instance. A useful metric would be number of ECDSA verifications per second, and then some discussion of where performance gains were made and where the remaining bottlenecks are for bandwidth.
